info.name: Nightly Caek - Fx4
info.description:
A Frankenstyle of hacks, mDrifus/Drifus, custom AppMenu, and various tweaks from all over the place. This is made for dark Win7/Vista themes. I don't recommend using Aero, it's ugly.

Before Image: Style with black Aero. Ew.
After Image: Style with APPOWS Dusk ( http://neiio.deviantart.com/art/APPOWS2010-157033415 )
info.additionalInfo:
Credits to drifus and Rist for the majority of the style's framework. 

WARNING: The CSS to this is really ugly and it's entirely my fault.
